roleset_name: separate, divide into smaller units or divide again.

roles.descr: divided among/between, if separate from arg1
roles.descr_trans: 如果与 arg1 分开，则划分在其中/之间

roles.descr: specific aspect of arg1 being used as criteria for subdivision
roles.descr_trans: arg1 的特定方面用作细分标准

roles.descr: divided into what?  Smaller parcel, resulting state of arg 1
roles.descr_trans: 分为什么？较小的包裹，结果状态为 arg 1

roleset_name_trans: 分开、分成更小的单位或再次划分。
